# Module: tf.keras.datasets.imdb



Defined in [`tensorflow/python/keras/datasets/imdb/__init__.py`](https://www.github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/r1.7/tensorflow/python/keras/datasets/imdb/__init__.py).

IMDB movie review sentiment classification dataset.

## Functions

[`get_word_index(...)`](../../../tf/keras/datasets/imdb/get_word_index): Retrieves the dictionary mapping word indices back to words.
